attributes.action: Explanation from Mr Shapps why is Turkey not removed from red list
attributes.additional_details: I can’t see my family as I can’t afford hotel quarantine at £3050 for me and my two daughters. I didn’t see my family for nearly two years. I need explanation!!!
attributes.background: What data are used when deciding🚦Data show 🇹🇷having around 25k new cases a day, 33% population fully vaxed. India, was moved from red to amber. 🇮🇳 was cause of Delta variant which spread rapidly around the world, India has 45000 new cases a day and only 3% of the population is fully vaxed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587179

The Government has explained why Turkey was placed on the red list in the Government response to the above petition.
